item.title: Getting the First Data Science Job
item.description: Last March, I wanted to break into the Data Science community but was struggling with confidence and starting to doubt I’d make it. I had been reading blog after blog about data science, practiced additional coding and learning new methods at night. And rejection after rejection, I wondered if I was on the right path. Now on the other side, hindsight is 20⁄20. I write this post to my past self, a person seeking for a job they couldn’t seem to get.
